king-morante-2020-must.title: Must Children be Vaccinated or not? Annotating Modal Verbs in the Vaccination Debate
king-morante-2020-must.author:
King, Liza  and
Morante, Roser
king-morante-2020-must.typeNotRelevantText: The paper analyzes the use of modal verbs in the vaccination debate, which centers around whether vaccines are safe, and whether it is morally acceptable to enforce mandatory vaccination. Nevertheless, morality is not the key concept, the paper just mentions briefly that some modal verbs (such as "should" indicate morality. The term moral* is only mentioned in the introduction.
